channel.title: How do I spawn a monster with more than 0 health?
channel.description: How do I spawn a monster with more than 0 health? Evertime I kill a monster I spawned I hit a 0 and it dies!

item.title: How do I spawn a monster with more than 0 health?
item.dc:creator: @god0456 god0456
item.description:
@god0456 wrote:

How do I edit it? When I try to open it it says windows cannot open this file.
What do you want to do?
Use the web service to find the appropriate program (which does nothing)
Select the program from a list

I hit the second one and it comes up with this web address:C:\Program Files\MoparScape\HybridScape\npc.cfg

How do I edit it?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I spawn a monster with more than 0 health?
